channel.title: Server Compression
channel.description:
Hi,
I was wonder if anyone can help me on making my Client File smaller...
When I upload it to Mediafire, it says 68.9 MB for .RAR and 70.2 MB for .ZIP....
I was wondering on how I might be able to make it a smaller (Around 30-50 MB for both) without getting tons of errors on my Client when I click on Runserver....
If any of you can tell me how to make it a smaller file I would really appreciate it....

item.title: Server Compression
item.dc:creator: @fallenlegend fallenlegend
item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

I don’t have a death cape…

I want to know how to add one though. Lol…

But yeah, a lot of my models look important…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Compression
item.dc:creator: @xmonster xmonster
item.description:
@xmonster wrote:

erm any model that doesnt have like info for it put in item.cfg and any models that were added that now have a spec… like for example dont delete ur d claws… delete like death cape or something

delete some of the model files
